Title: Antique / Vintage 1960 AMF Roadmaster Courier 3
text: Here is a chance of a lifetime - Antique (62 1/2 year old bike in amazing shape) 1960 AMF Roadmaster Courier 3, time capsule bicycle.   Sit back and imagine this story -  in the fall of 1959 a young man who has had a paper route and graduated from high school in the previous May/June. Requests his step-father go with him and help him buy the best bike for his planned career.  He wants to be a Courier, and wants the best bike they can find.  At a local hardware store in Colorado Springs they find it. It's a gold colored AMF Roadmaster Courier 3. The perfect bike for the position of a Courier a - 3 speed bicycle. The young man's plan is to be a courier until he finds a college that he will go to. He is hired as a courier and his dream starts for the next 2 years he rides his licensed Courier 3 bicycle. The odometer says a total of  179.9 miles.  After 2 years he decides to enlist in the Service, He is sent to Vietnam. He does not come home.  His mother and stepfather, decide to place his things in his bedroom and wait for his return. Fast forward to 2019 His stepfather passes away, followed by within 6 months of his mother's passing. The stepdaughter comes to get everything in order and situated with the home, finds the room. The room untouched for all these years with the bike sitting in it. She puts the bike up for sale and I buy it. What a collector piece of Americana, Of a historic time in America. This bike is set up exactly as it was left in fact it still has the original thread protectors on the front and rear of the bike. It has a basket and a rack as well as a bag.  It also still has the original courier license plate from Colorado Springs, Colorado.      Being in a dry climate it is rust free.  Yes this bike runs well -  shifts, brakes and is all polished up with new grease packed in original bearings. This is great for a collection, or is great for someone who wants to ride and enjoy it.  **And it can be yours if the price is right.** All original with the exception of tires, and tubes, (though I put on period correct that I searched out and found).  It has an odometer of that time period, as well as the caliper brakes, and buckhorn handle bars that came on it. And even a 1960 bicycle tire pump perfect for display (HITE Automotive Manufacturing Air Pump).
